data.actual_result: The server stops and is placed as soon as you reach the top/bottom of the screen
data.expected_result: You scroll the server list to keep moving the server
data.short_description: Moving a server to the top/bottom of the screen stops server reordering
data.steps_to_repro: - Long press on a server to be able to move it - Move the server to either the top or bottom of the screen without letting go - Observer what happens to the server
